definition: to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: People can't pull out the love from the heart.
sentences.chinese: 人們不能象拔牙那樣的從心中拔去愛情。

sentences.english: Today I'm going to take the bull by the horns and tell him he's fired.
sentences.chinese: 今天我打算虎口拔牙，單刀直入地對他說他被解僱了。

sentences.english: She cried (out) in pain when her tooth was pulled out.
sentences.chinese: 她拔牙時痛得叫了起來。

sentences.english: 'It's like pulling teeth to get him to discuss his problems.'
sentences.chinese: ‘要讓他說出自己的問題，就像拔牙般困難。’

sentences.english: I want to extract a tooth. It's the lower, left, third molar.
sentences.chinese: 我要給病人拔牙，拔的是下排左邊的第三顆磨牙。

sentences.english: Have you ever had prolonged bleeding from an injury or a tooth extraction?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有因爲受傷或拔牙而長期出血嗎？

sentences.english: A super big ZZZZZZ ready for the next day's tooth extracting.
sentences.chinese: 睡了一個超級美大呼呼，爲第二天的拔牙做好準備。

sentences.english: He cried with pain when the dentist pulled his tooth out.
sentences.chinese: 當牙醫給他拔牙時，他疼得叫起來。

sentences.english: In those days, dentistry was basic. Extractions were carried out without anaesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，牙科學剛起步，拔牙都不打麻藥。

sentences.english: My tooth could not boil finally, I decided that tomorrow will go to New York to pull a tooth.
sentences.chinese: 我的牙終於熬不住了，我決定明天去紐約拔牙。

sentences.english: The resorption of alveolar bone following tooth extraction may present a significant problem in implant and restorative dentistry.
sentences.chinese: 拔牙後的齒槽嵴吸收往往造成植牙和贗覆上的困難。

sentences.english: Has he loosened the periodontal ligament yet?
sentences.chinese: 他的拔牙器穿開了牙齦沒有啊？

sentences.english: She cried out with pain when the dentist pulled her tooth out.
sentences.chinese: 牙醫拔牙時她痛得喊叫起來。

sentences.english: The spaces of lower first molar were all closed using mesiotranslation of lower second molar.
sentences.chinese: 應用第二磨牙近中平移技術關閉第一磨牙拔牙間隙。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the ways of enhancing the safety of tooth extraction in the heart-cerebrovascular disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討提高心血管疾病患者拔牙安全性的方法。

definition: to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
to have a false tooth set in/denture
caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
to give or have an injection
general anesthetic/abbr. for 全身麻醉
